I participate in JDave (http://jdave.org).  A BDD framework for Java
that t=
akes advantage of JUnit for example for Eclipse integration.  

We have tes=
ts in non-static inner classes of our test classes.  These
run wonderfully =
using the @RunWith annotation and our own runner.

however, for individual =
tests, this doesn't work.  What I would like
to do is that AllDefaultPossib=
ilitiesBuilder would check whether or
not the test class is a non static me=
mber class.  if it is, then I
would grab the runner of the declaring class =
instead.

I made a patch implementing this.  I will try to attach it.
